statements: SELECT * FROM loan_details;
SELECT loan_id, borrower_name, loan_amount FROM loan_details WHERE loan_duration > 12;
SELECT borrower_name, loan_amount, interest_rate FROM loan_details WHERE loan_amount > 5000;
SELECT loan_duration, interest_rate FROM loan_details WHERE loan_amount BETWEEN 2000 AND 10000;
SELECT loan_id, loan_amount, interest_rate FROM loan_details WHERE borrower_name LIKE 'John%';
SELECT * FROM loan_details WHERE loan_amount > 10000 ORDER BY loan_amount DESC;
SELECT borrower_name, loan_amount FROM loan_details WHERE interest_rate < 5.0;
SELECT loan_id, loan_amount, loan_duration FROM loan_details WHERE loan_duration >= 12 ORDER BY loan_duration ASC, loan_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM loan_details WHERE interest_rate BETWEEN 4.0 AND 6.0;
SELECT loan_id, borrower_name, loan_amount, interest_rate FROM loan_details WHERE borrower_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY interest_rate DESC;
SELECT * FROM loan_details;
SELECT borrower_name, loan_amount, interest_rate FROM loan_details ORDER BY loan_amount DESC;
SELECT loan_id, borrower_name, loan_start_date, loan_end_date FROM loan_details WHERE interest_rate > 5;
SELECT loan_id, borrower_name, loan_amount, interest_rate FROM loan_details WHERE loan_amount < 5000 ORDER BY loan_amount ASC;
SELECT loan_id, borrower_name, loan_amount, loan_start_date, loan_end_date FROM loan_details WHERE loan_start_date > '2022-01-01' AND loan_end_date < '2023-01-01';
SELECT borrower_name, loan_amount, interest_rate FROM loan_details
SELECT * FROM payment_schedules WHERE payment_status='Pending'
SELECT loan_id, borrower_name, loan_amount, loan_start_date FROM loan_details WHERE loan_amount > 10000
SELECT payment_id, payment_date, amount_paid FROM payment_schedules ORDER BY payment_date DESC
SELECT loan_id, loan_start_date, loan_end_date, COUNT(*) AS total_payments FROM payment_schedules GROUP BY loan_id HAVING total_payments > 5 ORDER BY total_payments DESC
SELECT * FROM loan_accounts;
SELECT loan_id, customer_id, loan_amount FROM loan_accounts WHERE loan_status = 'Active';
SELECT customer_id, loan_amount, interest_rate FROM loan_accounts WHERE interest_rate > 5.0;
SELECT loan_id, start_date, due_date FROM loan_accounts ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT payment_id, payment_date, payment_amount, payment_status FROM payment_schedules WHERE payment_status = 'Pending';
SELECT * FROM loan_accounts WHERE loan_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, loan_amount, due_date FROM loan_accounts WHERE interest_rate > 5;
SELECT loan_id, customer_id, SUM(transaction_amount) AS total_transactions FROM loan_transactions GROUP BY loan_id;
SELECT payment_id, payment_date, payment_amount, payment_status FROM payment_schedules WHERE payment_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY payment_amount DESC;
SELECT loan_id, transaction_type, transaction_amount FROM loan_transactions WHERE transaction_type IN ('deposit', 'withdrawal') ORDER BY transaction_amount ASC;
SELECT * FROM Customers;
SELECT customer_name, address, contact_number FROM Customers;
SELECT loan_id, loan_amount, interest_rate FROM LoanDetails WHERE loan_amount > 5000;
SELECT customer_name, address FROM Customers WHERE contact_number LIKE '%123%';
SELECT loan_id, loan_amount, loan_start_date FROM LoanDetails ORDER BY loan_start_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM LoanDetails WHERE interest_rate > 5 ORDER BY loan_amount DESC;
SELECT customer_id, loan_amount, loan_start_date FROM LoanDetails WHERE loan_duration >= 12 AND loan_amount > 5000 ORDER BY loan_duration, loan_amount;
SELECT Customers.customer_id, customer_name, address, loan_amount FROM Customers INNER JOIN LoanDetails ON Customers.customer_id = LoanDetails.customer_id WHERE loan_amount < 10000;
SELECT loan_id, payment_date, amount_paid, payment_status FROM PaymentSchedule WHERE payment_status = 'Pending' AND payment_date < '2022-12-31' ORDER BY amount_paid DESC;

SELECT customer_name, address, contact_number, loan_amount, outstanding_balance FROM Customers INNER JOIN LoanAccounts ON Customers.customer_id = LoanAccounts.customer_id WHERE outstanding_balance > 0 ORDER BY customer_name;
SELECT * FROM LoanAccounts;
SELECT customer_name, loan_amount FROM LoanAccounts WHERE interest_rate > 5.0;
SELECT customer_name, loan_amount, start_date, end_date FROM LoanAccounts ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, loan_amount FROM LoanAccounts WHERE customer_name LIKE 'J%' ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT type_name FROM LoanTypes;
SELECT * FROM LoanAccounts WHERE loan_amount > 5000 ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, loan_amount, interest_rate FROM LoanAccounts WHERE interest_rate >= 4.5 ORDER BY customer_name;
SELECT type_name, description FROM LoanTypes WHERE LENGTH(description) > 100 ORDER BY type_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%' OR phone_number LIKE '%777%';
SELECT * FROM Transactions WHERE amount BETWEEN 1000 AND 5000 ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
